description: Ministry of Labour and Labour Relations - Appointed Mr. T. Piyasoma, Mr. K. R. M. N. Lawrence and Mr. P. Danansooriya as the Arbitrators to the Industrial Disputes - Mrs. B. G. Priyani and the Employees Trust Fund - Mr. W. M. Jayasinghe and Sri Lanka Transport Board - Mr. R. P. Asoka Rajapakse and Mr. M. S. Chandrasiri and State Engineering Corporation of Sri Lanka respectively
